statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Marin Mornar's free throw with 1:03 left stood up as the difference and Loyola Marymount beat UC Riverside 77-76 on Sunday.
article.headline: Loyola Marymount ekes out win over UC Riverside 77-76
article.linkText: Loyola Marymount ekes out win over UC Riverside 77-76
article.story: LOS ANGELES -- Marin Mornar's free throw with 1:03 left stood up as the difference and Loyola Marymount beat UC Riverside 77-76 on Sunday. Mornar made 1 of 2 from the line after being fouled by Malik Thames. UC Riverside turned it over on its next possession, but LMU's Brandon Brown missed a jumper, giving the Highlanders one last shot. Jaylen Bland's 3-pointer with 3 seconds left missed, and the Lions hung on. Adam Jacko led Loyola Marymount (5-3) with 16 points and seven rebounds. Munis Tutu scored 13 points while Mornar finished with 11 points. Taylor Johns led UC Riverside (5-3) with 24 points, and tied a career high with 17 rebounds. Secean Johnson and Bland both scored 17 points. UC Riverside led by 10 on Thames' 3-pointer with 8:32 to go in the first half. But Loyola Marymount went on a 9-2 run and trailed by one, 44-43, at intermission.
